parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns class name of currently used Head Mounted Display. Returns an empty string if the slot is empty.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hmd''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_nvgs = [[hmd]] [[player]]; //NVGoggles</code>
 

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[headgear]], [[goggles]], [[binocular]]
</value></part></template></root>
